entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 10:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.4°C

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -28.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
